name: Education is the best gift
text: We mainly teach children aged between 6-14 years. Typical subjects taught include English, Maths and many more.

name: Guide them in farming
text: Agriculture is one of the oldest and most essential industries in the world. We help them grow their farming

name: We provide free meals
text: We know the pain of not having food on the table. Therefore, I'm determined to help the needy.

name: The ocean cleanup
text: Beach cleanup projects protect our aquatic ecosystems from the harmful effects of pollution.

name: Help community to rise
text: Our mission is to help small communities to rise out of poverty. We provide food, clothes.

name: Health care for unprivileged
text: We Contribute to developing healthcare services and basic education in schools and communities.
